☞USES: Attach these Versatile Extender Bars to any Powered/Cordless Drill Chuck or Impact Driver to turn it into a High-Speed Nut Driver – Useful for Automotive Mechanic Vehicle Repairs, Technicians, Handyman & Hobbyist Developments to use with sockets on Hardware/Tire Nuts, Lag Bolts, Hex Head Cap Screws at Home, Workshop Factory or Construction Site.
☞Multifunction: used in the installation of pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other installation for the hexagonal tool .It is a good accessory for conversion.Provides versatility and convenience no matter which tool you chose to use. Great for the DIY, household maintenance, and most general repairs, not for industrial work. A great tool addition to any tool box set.
☞Durability: Quality is a guarantee with this 3 piece sturdy and durable solid steel set designed to withstand torque compression under most standard use situations. The exterior anti-weathering coating provides extra protection from damage against elements and substances such as oil and fluids that may come in contact with the extension bars during use with repairs such as in the automotive field.

#14 in Tap Extractors
Date First Available October 10, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $32.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:06 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Material
Cr-V Cr-M Cr-M Cr-M Cr-V Cr-V

Drive Size
1/2″ , 1/4″, 3/8″ 1/2″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 3/8″ 1/2″

Style
/ 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 Point Shallow 6 & 12 Point Shallow

Are you tired of the bolts, nuts, and screws are damaged even if stripped, rusted, or frozen? What will you do? Break it loose with a breaker bar and then fitting the new socket by a hammer or a mallet? But this will damage your socket. Thankfully, THINKWORK impact bolt extractor set is around you to help you to continue to work on your project with ease.

Includes 16 pieces of the most used SAE and metric sizes impact bolt extractors.

3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″.

Superior Gripping Power

The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes is designed to bite down to provide maximum gripping power. The more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.

Hex Adapter & Knockout Pin

1/4″ drive hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.

Standard 3/8 Inch Square Drive

All the extractors can be used by hand tools or any 3/8-inch air and power tools.

Organized Storage

All the extractors are well packed in a heavy-duty blow-molded case for secure storage and easy carry.

Each bolt extractor is made of high hardness chrome-molybdenum steel for superior durability and longer life. It will easily extract damaged bolts, nuts, and screws even if they are stripped, rusted, or frozen.
The internal thread with reverse spiral flutes design to bite down to provide maximum gripping power, the more you turn, the tighter the socket grips.
Standard 3/8-inch drive and hex adapter to let the extractors compatible with common to heavy-duty power tools, drivers and screwdrivers handle tools. The knockout pin for easier removal.
18 pieces 3/8 inch drive bolt & nut remover comes with 3/4″(19mm), 11/16″, 17mm, 5/8″(16mm), 9/16″, 14mm, 13mm, 1/2″, 12mm, 7/16″(11mm), 10mm, 3/8″, 9mm, 5/16″(8mm), 7mm, 1/4″, hex adapter and knockout pin.
Heavy-duty blow-molded case lets all the extraction sockets stay organized and take your set on the go.

#12 in Riveters
Date First Available July 9, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $76.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Excellent Design:Simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design.Its design and long arm enable you to save 40% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.Come with 13pc interchangeable mandrels and 200pc rivet nuts in a sturdy case, all ready for your project.

Quick Changing Mandrels

Tool-free quick-change head design make it simple to change mandrels and nose pieces quickly without the need for additional tools, smooth your project and save your time.

Strong and Durable

The rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated finish which protect against corrosion and give this tool added durability and strength.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Organized Storage Solution

All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping.

Provide a customized fastener solution for wide riveting applications, such as body panels, bicycle attachments, furniture and decorations, especially for off-road / Jeep modifications.

WARM TIPS:

The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

EASY TO USE- New “Toolless Quick-Change Head” design allows for easy changing of mandrels and nose pieces by hand
STRONG AND DURABLE – The 16″ rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. With designed structure and tough materiels it is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.
VARIOUS USE-CASE SCENARIOS – It provide professional solution for all kinds of riveting cases as metal plate, plastic piece, riveting workpiece, bicycle attachments, car attachments, decorations etc.
COMPLETE ACCESSORIES & SOLID CARRYING CASE – Equipped with 13pc interchangeable mandrels(Metric M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 M12; SAE 8-32,10-24,1/4-20,5/16-18,3/8-16,1/2-13) and 200pc rivet nuts (20 rivet nuts each for M3,M4,M5,M6;8-32,10-24, 1/4-20, 10 rivet nuts each for M8,M10,M12; 5/16- 18, 3/8-16,1/2-13.)Please note that the M8 mandrel was installed in the gun,so the small box of M8 is empty.All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability.
WARRANTY AND SERVICE – Incase you are not satisfied with this product for any reason, or you have any question please feel free to contact us, we are ready to service you any time.

Excellent Design:Simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design.Its design and long arm enable you to save 40% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.Come with 13pc interchangeable mandrels and 200pc rivet nuts in a sturdy case, all ready for your project.

Quick Changing Mandrels

Tool-free quick-change head design make it simple to change mandrels and nose pieces quickly without the need for additional tools, smooth your project and save your time.

Strong and Durable

The rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated finish which protect against corrosion and give this tool added durability and strength.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Organized Storage Solution

All pieces are packed in a rugged, compact carrying case for storage and portability. Each tool fits snugly into its respective place to prevent moving around and scraping.

Read more

Provide a customized fastener solution for wide riveting applications, such as body panels, bicycle attachments, furniture and decorations, especially for off-road / Jeep modifications.

WARM TIPS:

  • The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.
  • The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.
  • Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $82.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:35:29 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ABOUT GIANTISAN

GIANTISAN consistently provides more innovative, stronger and exquisite tools to improve our world.

GIANTISAN consists of the word Giant and Artisan, believing in that everyone can be a giant of a artisan with the right tools to equip themselves.

About GT607

The 16″ newly produced rivet nut tool is an integration of several latest design concepts- simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design. Its design and long arm enable you to save 50% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

Quick Chinging Mandrels

The kit offer as much as 12 sizes of mandrels and rivet nuts, however it is very simple to exchanging different mandrels by hand.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Long Lasting & Durable

Made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. It is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.

Organized Storage Solution

Solid case with organized space for storage and protection of the tool and all accessories.

PRODUCT INCLUDES:

1 x 16”Hand Rivet Nut Tool7 x Metric and 5 x SAE Mandrels176 x Rivet Nuts in Storage Case1 x Versatile Spanner1 x Detailed User Manual1 x Rugged Tool Case

WARM TIPS:

The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.Please be noted that the M8 mandrel are already installed on the tool, so the small box of M8 is empty.

INNOVATIVE MECHANISM – Toolless operation to change head. The Inner threaded base & hex sleeve firmly lock the mandrel during riveting.
STRONG AND DURABLE – The 16″ rivet nut tool is made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. With designed structure and tough materiels it is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.
VARIOUS USE-CASE SCENARIOS – It provide professional solution for all kinds of riveting cases as metal plate, riveting workpiece, bicycle attachments, car attachments etc.
ORGANIZED STORAGE SOLUTION – A rivnut tool, 12 interchangable mandrels including M3 M4 M5 M6 M8 M10 M12 10-24 1/4-20 3/8-16 5/16-18 1/2-13, 176pcs rivnuts, a spanner, a storage case keep all rivet nuts, a detailed user manual, and a rugged carrying case to keep all of them organized.
WARRANTY AND SERVICE – Incase you are not satisfied with this product for any reason, or you have any question please feel free to contact us, we are ready to service you any time.

ABOUT GIANTISAN

GIANTISAN consistently provides more innovative, stronger and exquisite tools to improve our world.

GIANTISAN consists of the word Giant and Artisan, believing in that everyone can be a giant of a artisan with the right tools to equip themselves.

About GT607

The 16″ newly produced rivet nut tool is an integration of several latest design concepts- simple using, effort saving, high reliability and comfortability of ergonomic design. Its design and long arm enable you to save 50% effort than normal rivet nut tool and experience a more comfortable way of work.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

Quick Chinging Mandrels

The kit offer as much as 12 sizes of mandrels and rivet nuts, however it is very simple to exchanging different mandrels by hand.

Easy To Operate

It makes riveting work so easy by just 3-4 simple steps.

Long Lasting & Durable

Made from thick carbon steel with heat treated, and black phosphating finishing protects against corrosion. U cross-section of arm is of high reliability to prevent getting bent. It is sturdy and durable enough for long life performance.

Organized Storage Solution

Solid case with organized space for storage and protection of the tool and all accessories.

  • 1 x 16”Hand Rivet Nut Tool
  • 7 x Metric and 5 x SAE Mandrels
  • 176 x Rivet Nuts in Storage Case
  • 1 x Versatile Spanner
  • 1 x Detailed User Manual

WARM TIPS:

  • The tool is capable of over setting small rivnut as M3,M4 and 10-24 etc. When setting small rivnut, please apply less power on the handles and the arms of the tool do not need to come very close to each other, or the small mandrel can be damaged.
  • The mandrels are consumable. Frequent or improper use would consume the useful life of them, and even damage them. The mandrels and replacements which are universal can be easily found in Amazon.

▲Package Included:
1 x (1/4 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 6.35mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (3/8 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 9mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (1/2 * 1/4 * 72mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 13mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x 105 Degree Right Angle Drill
▲Key Features: 
1. Adapts sockets to power drills and drivers
2. Detent ball for secure socket retention so sockets snap on tightly and won’t slip off
3. 1/4-inch hex shank prevents stripping during high speed drill operation
4. Super strong heat-treated chrome vanadium steel for normal and impact use
5. Sandblasted finish
6. Converts all power drills into speedy socket drivers
